channel.title: Dimensionality Reduction on Deepesh Nathani
channel.description: Recent content in Dimensionality Reduction on Deepesh Nathani

item.title: tSNE
item.description: Recently, I came across an interesting non-linear visualization or dimensionality reduction method - tSNE(Distributed Stochastic Neighbour Embedding). Here is the original paper describing the method in much more detail. I thought i’ll implement this from scratch. In this post I am sharing the code with extensive comments :) Before moving onto the code, here is a brief overview of how it works. tSNE is just like PCA where you can reduce the dimensionality of data to 2 or 3 dimensions to visualize it.
